document.full_text: dominique strauss-kahn's philandering past is not in dispute. but it is a grave mistake to argue that his history as a seducer makes him a more plausible rapist, even if he is eventually found guilty.
document.title: way of the world: a dangerous blurring of distinctions
lines_and_colors: dominique strauss-kahn's philandering past is not in dispute. but it is a grave mistake to argue that his history as a seducer makes him a more plausible rapist, even if he is eventually found guilty.
